Sentencas: Perovskite-type ABO, (where A = La. Ca: B = Co) ceramics are very promising materials for oxygen separation membrane and solid oxide fuel cells applications, However, their mechanical behavior has not yet been adequately studied.
Titulo: Ferroelasticity and hysteresis in LaCoO3 based perovskites

Sentencas: We studied the mechanical performance of perovskite ceramics using a combination of microindentation.
Titulo: Ferroelasticity and hysteresis in LaCoO3 based perovskites
Ferroelasticity and hysteresis in LaCoO3 based perovskites

Sentencas: Our work demonstrated ferroelastic hysteretic behavior during indentation and compression loading in LaCoO3 based perovskites.
Titulo: Ferroelasticity and hysteresis in LaCoO3 based perovskites

Sentencas: This behavior can be caused by domain reorientation and/or phase transformation.
Titulo: Ferroelasticity and hysteresis in LaCoO3 based perovskites

Sentencas: Domain switching under the compression loading in LaCoO3 based perovskites has been demonstrated by XRD.
Titulo: Ferroelasticity and hysteresis in LaCoO3 based perovskites

Sentencas: Nonlinearity during fracture toughness measurements was observed in the dense La0.8Ca0.2CoO3 perovskite.
Titulo: Ferroelasticity and hysteresis in LaCoO3 based perovskites

Sentencas: Such nonlinearity can be assigned to the domain switching or the phase transformation during crack propagation.
Titulo: Ferroelasticity and hysteresis in LaCoO3 based perovskites

Sentencas: This might be a reason of a higher fracture toughness of this material compared to non-ferroelastic composition.
Titulo: Ferroelasticity and hysteresis in LaCoO3 based perovskites
Ferroelasticity and hysteresis in LaCoO3 based perovskites
